name: Town Theater
description: The cultural heart of Hill Valley, the Town Theater is a grand old building with a rich history. The marquee proudly announces the latest community production, and the box office is doing a brisk business. Inside, the air is filled with the scent of fresh popcorn and the excited chatter of theatergoers. The plush red velvet seats have seen generations of Hill Valley residents enjoy everything from school plays to traveling vaudeville acts. This is a place where the community comes together to celebrate the magic of live performance.
